data.title: Sitemap
data.text:
Toggle Content Why CFP Certification

CFP® certification is the standard of excellence in financial planning. Learn about the opportunities and benefits of getting certified.

Toggle Content Get Certified

The CFP® certification process is known as the "4E's": Education, Exam, Experience & Ethics. Together, they prepare you to become a competent, ethical financial advisor.

Toggle Content Ethics

CFP Board's enforcement of ethical and practice standards distinguishes CFP® certification from other financial designations.

Toggle Content Career and Growth

Resources for CFP® professionals, including CE programs, client materials, opportunities to get involved and stay connected with CFP Board, and the Career Center.

Toggle Content Knowledge

Fresh perspectives, data, news and analysis from the financial planning profession provided by CFP Board.

Toggle Content Initiatives

CFP Board works on initiatives that support the financial planning workforce and uphold CFP® certification as the recognized standard of excellence for competent and ethical personal financial planning.

Toggle Content For Employers

We work with firms, large and small, to support and grow their number of CFP® professionals.

Toggle Content For Education Partners

CFP Board collaborates with financial planning educators across the country on programs designed to create competent, ethical financial planners.

For Media

Information and resources for members of the media about CFP Board, the financial planning profession and the value of CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ professionals to the public.

Toggle Content About CFP Board

CFP Board is a non-profit organization that serves the public by setting and enforcing standards for the CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ certification.

Toggle Content CFP Board Center for Financial Planning

CFP Board Center for Financial Planning is a qualified, diverse workforce and research-based body of knowledge for the financial planning profession.

Toggle Content News

Press releases, announcements and other updates about CFP Board and the value of CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ professionals.

Toggle Content Events

Stay up to date with all of our events, including conferences, seminars, webinars and other meetings.

Verify a CFP Professional

Verify whether an individual is a current CFP® professional or held CFP® certification in the past.

Account Registration

Account Registration for CFP Board.

Toggle Content Account

Contact

Find CFP Board contact emails and phone numbers, along with a form for getting in touch with us.

Terms of Use

Terms of use for CFP.net.

Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy for CFP Board.

Accessibility

CFP Board is committed to web accessibility on CFP.net for people with disabilities and maintaining the relevant web accessibility standards.
